action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 22}) and pulled up to 15 feet towards the dragon.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 19} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. Stworzenie może powtórzyć rzut ratujący na koniec każdej swojej tury, kończąc efekt na sobie w przypadku sukcesu. Jeśli rzut ratunkowy się powiedzie lub efekt się skończy, stworzenie jest odporne na Przerażającą Obecność Smoka przez następne 24 godziny.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 120 ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 22d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 22} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

action.name: Depersonalization Breath (1/Day)
entries: Each creature in a 120 ft. cone must make a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the controlling player exchanges control of the creature with another player until the end of the dragon's next turn. At the beginning of an affected creatures turn, start a timer. The creature takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage for each 6 seconds the player takes to resolve its turn.

reaction.name: Disorienting Lurch
entries: As a reaction to succeeding on a saving throw, the dragon may force any number of creatures within 60 feet to succceed on a {@dc 22} Charisma saving throw or be teleported 30 feet in a direction of the dragon's choice. Then, if the dragon is at least partially obscured, it may attempt to Hide as part of this reaction.

reaction.name: Out of Nowhere
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack while its Displacement is active, the dragon makes a tendril attack. If it hits, it may immediately us its Hurl ability as part of this reaction, and its Displacement trait is disabled until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 253 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Derealization Breath.

legendary.name: Slink
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Hurl
entries: The dragon throws a creature it has {@condition grappled} up to 30 feet. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, in addition to any damage from falling.

legendary.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon lifts a {@condition grappled} creature up and slams it into the ground, releasing the grapple. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand on its following turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

trait.name: Illusory Passage
entries: The dragon can move through natural and magical foliage as though it were illusory.

trait.name: Capricious Jest
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon and attempts to move must first make a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the dragon controls its movement this turn.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The dragon has an illusory double that mirrors its movements imperfectly, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the dragon may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 19} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the dragon. While climbing on the dragon, a creature is unaffected by its displacement trait.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}) and pulled up to 10 feet towards the dragon.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 16} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. Stworzenie może powtórzyć rzut ratujący na koniec każdej swojej tury, kończąc efekt na sobie w przypadku sukcesu. Jeśli rzut ratunkowy się powiedzie lub efekt się skończy, stworzenie jest odporne na Przerażającą Obecność Smoka przez następne 24 godziny.

A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage and be unable to stand this turn, or take half as much damage on a success.

reaction.name: Slink
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Capricious Jest

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes two attacks, one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Derealization Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an shimmering aurora of existential crises in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more becomes convinced that it is an illusion. An affected creature cannot concentrate on spells, loses concentration if it was holding it, and makes a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that targets itself with an attack or spell immediately ends this effect.

reaction.name: Slink
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Smok może poruszać się po oblodzonych powierzchniach i wspinać się na nie bez konieczności sprawdzania umiejętności. Dodatkowo, trudny teren złożony z lodu lub śniegu nie kosztuje go dodatkowego ruchu.

trait.name: Freezing Blood
entries: Whenever the silver dragon takes piercing or slashing damage, it raises its AC cumulatively by 1 until the beginning of its next turn, or until it takes at least 15 points of fire damage.

trait.name: Flattery Vulnerability
entries: When subjected to flattery by a medium or smaller creature, the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or behave as though {@condition charmed} by the creature until it takes hostile action against the dragon or its allies. A dragon that succeeds on this save becomes immune to flattery from that creature for the next minute.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes four  attacks: one of which may be with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 108 ({@damage 24d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Hypothermic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of chilling gas. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition paralyzed} outside of its own turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more must use its action to doff its armor or shield.

reaction.name: Freeze Spell
entries: As a reaction to seeing a creature cast a spell within 60 feet, the dragon chills the magic, preventing the spell from taking effect until the beginning of the spellcaster's next turn.

reaction.name: Raking Riposte
entries: As a reaction to being missed with a melee attack, the dragon makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 251 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Shield the Weak
entries: The dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it ends that movement within 15 feet of a friendly creature, the creature gains +5 to its AC and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or until it moves further away.

legendary.name: Face Me!
entries: One creature within 30 feet is compelled to meet the dragon in melee combat. An affected creature that attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell from more than 10 feet away on its following turn must first make a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature loses the attack or spell.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: Smok czerpie ze swoich najgłębszych rezerw. Do końca swojej następnej tury, obrażenia od zimna zadawane przez smoka ignorują odporność na obrażenia, a smok traci jedną ze swoich legendarnych odporności.

legendary.name: Cryostasis
entries: One creature that died within the last minute returns to life with 0 hit points and automatically stabilizes.

entries: Smok może poruszać się po oblodzonych powierzchniach i wspinać się na nie bez konieczności sprawdzania umiejętności. Dodatkowo, trudny teren złożony z lodu lub śniegu nie kosztuje go dodatkowego ruchu.

trait.name: Flattery Vulnerability
entries: When subjected to flattery by a medium or smaller creature, the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the creature until it takes hostile action against the dragon or its allies. A dragon that succeeds on this save becomes immune to flattery from that creature for the next minute.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Freezing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Hypothermic Breath
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of chilling gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature is {@condition paralyzed} outside of its own turn, and repeats this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more must use its action to doff its armor or shield.

reaction.name: Shield the Weak
entries: As a reaction to a friendly creature it can see being targeted with an attack, the dragon moves up to half its speed without provoking attacks of opportunity. If it ends that movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature gains +2 to its AC (including against the triggering attack) and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or until it moves further away.

trait.name: Outshine the Eager
entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

trait.name: Jester's Fury
entries: Whenever one or more creatures within 60 ft. fail to laugh at a humorous comment or pun made by the dragon, it rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

trait.name: Acid Fumes
entries: A creature that starts its turn iwthin 10 ft. of the dragon takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in an 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 81 ({@damage 18d8}) acid damage and losing 20% of the gold and platinum it is carrying on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Unattended gold and platinum in the area dissolves entirely.

action.name: Slowing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

reaction.name: Heckler's Veto
entries: As a reaction to a creature it can see within 60 ft. casting a spell, the dragon forces the creature to make a {@dc 21} saving throw using the creature's spell casting ability. On a failed save, the spell fails.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 260 hit points, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Banter
entries: The dragon offers a humorous comment or pun on an action a creature within 60 ft. took on its previous turn. The creature may use its reaction to reply with a humorous comment or salient pun of its own. If it does, both the creature and the dragon have advantage on the next attack or saving throw they make in the next minute. If it fails to do so, the creature has disadvantage on the next attack or saving throw it makes in the next minute.

legendary.name: False Wall
entries: The dragon raises an illusory wall of opaque stone, 20 ft. high and 20 ft. long, within 60 ft. A creature that attempts to pass through must succeed on a {@dc 21} Intelligence saving throw to do so. A creature that knows the wall is an illusion makes this save at advantage.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

entries: At initiative count 20, the dragon may force one creature within 60 ft. that it can see to make a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the dragon trades initiatives with it.

trait.name: Jester's Fury
entries: Whenever one or more creatures within 60 ft. fail to laugh at a humorous comment or pun made by the dragon, it rolls to recharge its breath weapon.

trait.name: Acid Fumes
entries: A creature that starts its turn iwthin 10 ft. of the dragon takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Tail

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}

action.name: Aqua Regia Breath

action.name: Slowing Breath
entries: The dragon exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

variant.name: Note: Aqua Regia
entries: Aqua regia is a mix of hydrochloric acid and nitric acid that is notable for its ability to dissolve gold and platinum, while leaving silver intact. Real aqua regia does dissolve copper, but I think it's much more on-theme for a copper dragon to keep all its copper and silver in a big, easilly plunderable pile, while its gold and platinum is kept dissolved in massive pools of fuming acid. If you've got a chemist in your group who's a stickler for that kind of thing, just call it Alkahest Breath instead.

variant.name: Recovering the Treasure
entries: A creature proficient in alchemy tools may use them to attempt a {@dc 15} ability check over the course of a work day, precipitating {@dice 2d10} x 100gp worth of gold dust out of the acid on a success. A creature may attempt this check any number of times, though the total amount of gold recovered in this way is limited by the amount originally disolved in the acid. A creature that fails this check by 5 or more exhausts their supply of reagents and must acquire a new kit to attempt it again.

trait.name: You Haven't Heard the Best Part

legendary.name: This Reminds Me... (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje trzy ataki: jeden gryzieniem i dwa pazurami.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 16} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. Stworzenie może powtórzyć rzut ratujący na koniec każdej swojej tury, kończąc efekt na sobie w przypadku sukcesu. Jeśli rzut ratunkowy się powiedzie lub efekt się skończy, stworzenie jest odporne na Przerażającą Obecność Smoka przez następne 24 godziny.

action.name: This Reminds Me..
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Breath of Lingering Flames
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 45 ({@damage 13d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes and gain 21 ({@dice 6d6}) temporary hit points, or 45 ({@dice 13d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with an attack while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 87 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: This Reminds Me... (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. While the dragon is telling a story, it cannot use its breath weapons, and a creature that can hear the dragon and attempts to target the dragon with an attack or harmful spell must first make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell.
The dragon can continue the story as a bonus action on each of its turns, extending the duration until the end of its following turn.

legendary.name: Calm The Unruly
entries: The dragon shoots a wilting glare at one creature within 30 ft, ending one condition affecting it. The condition can be {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, Hasted, Polymorphed, or Raging.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Burrowing Retreat
entries: The dragon moves up to half its burrow speed. If burrowing in sand, each creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's turn.

trait.name: Burning Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the dragon takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Breath of Lingering Flames
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 42 ({@damage 12d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

action.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute and gain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) temporary hit points, or 21 ({@dice 6d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with a melee attack while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

trait.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: This Reminds Me..
entries: The dragon begins telling a story that lasts until the end of its next turn. trait.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

trait.name: Breath of Lingering Flames
entries: The dragon exhales fire in an 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide and persists until the end of its next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in that line, or enters it for the first time on a turn, must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage, or half as much on a successful save.

trait.name: Breath of Deepening Sleep
entries: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute and gain 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points, or 14 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points if it failed the save by 5 or more. This effect ends for a creature if it loses any non-temporary hit points.

reaction.name: I Wasn't Finished!
entries: As a reaction to a creature hitting the dragon with a melee attack while the dragon is telling a story, the dragon ends the story and uses one of its breath weapons, if available.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Smok może poruszać się po oblodzonych powierzchniach i wspinać się na nie bez konieczności sprawdzania umiejętności. Dodatkowo, trudny teren złożony z lodu lub śniegu nie kosztuje go dodatkowego ruchu.

trait.name: Sluggish Chill
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or be unable to make more than a single attack on its turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje cztery ataki: jeden gryzieniem, dwa pazurami i jeden ogonem. Nie może wykonać ataków gryzieniem i ogonem na ten sam cel.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 90 ({@damage 20d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of ice in a 300-foot cone that clings to living creatures, sapping their vitality. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a creature gains 45 ({@dice 10d8}) temporary HP. As long as it has this temporary HP, the creature is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and has vulnerability to fire damage. A creature that starts its turn with any of this temporary HP must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be forced to expend three hit dice. If it cannot, it drops to 0 HP.

reaction.name: Sudden Pounce
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 120 feet of the dragon ending its turn further away than it started, the dragon moves up to its speed toward the creature without provoking attacks of opportunity and makes a claw attack.

reaction.name: Freezing Blood
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon adds 3 to its AC until the beginning of its next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 262 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its Freezing Breath.

legendary.name: Raise Hackles
entries: One creature within 30 feet must succed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or lose any immunity it has to the dragon's Frightful Presence or the {@condition frightened} condition.

legendary.name: Terrorize
entries: One {@condition frightened} creature within 30 feet must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage. On the creature's next turn, it must use its movement to run away from the dragon.

legendary.name: Uttercold
entries: Smok czerpie ze swoich najgłębszych rezerw. Do końca swojej następnej tury, obrażenia od zimna zadawane przez smoka ignorują odporność na obrażenia, a smok traci jedną ze swoich legendarnych odporności.

trait.name: Ice Walk

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} do trafienia, zasięg 15 stóp, jeden cel. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) obrażeń od uderzenia, a cel zostaje odepchnięty na 15 stóp od smoka.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 16} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 72 ({@damage 16d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain, and a creatue that starts its turn in it or enters the area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ice Tomb Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Smok wydycha bryłę lodu w stożku o średnicy 90 stóp, która przylega do żywych istot, pozbawiając je witalności. Każda istota w tym obszarze musi wykonać rzut ratunkowy na wytrzymałość {@dc 22}. W przypadku porażki, stworzenie zyskuje 45 ({@dice 10d8}) tymczasowych HP. Tak długo jak ma to tymczasowe HP, stworzenie jest {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded} i ma podatność na obrażenia od ognia. Stworzenie, które rozpoczyna swoją turę z którymkolwiek z tych tymczasowych HP musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 16} Konstytucję lub zostać zmuszone do wydatkowania dwóch kostek trafień. Jeśli się nie uda, spada do 0 HP.

Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw, taking 105 ({@damage 30d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. At the beginning of the dragon's next turn, the affected area becomes lava, and remains in that state until the beginning the dragon's following turn. A creature that starts its turn in lava or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Malicious Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon breathes malicious intent into all flames in a 300-foot cone. The dragon summons a fire elemental in the space of each creature in the area that is on fire. The fire elementals act on initiative count 20.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Burn Away
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and have one magical effect on it end.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: Smok toczy się, by naładować jedną ze swoich broni oddechowych.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: Kiedy istota bez odporności na ogień rozpoczyna swoją turę w odległości 10 stóp od smoka, zapala się i zaczyna płonąć. Dopóki ktoś nie podejmie akcji, by oblać ogień, stworzenie to otrzymuje 5 ({@damage 1d10}) obrażeń od ognia na początku każdej swojej tury.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje trzy ataki: jeden gryzieniem i dwa pazurami.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20})

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Slag Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 ({@damage 26d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The stone in the affected area begins to melt, becoming difficult terrain. At the beginning of the dragon's next turn, the affected area becomes lava, and remains in that state until the beginning the dragon's following turn. A creature that starts its turn in lava or enters it for the first time on a turn takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Malicious Flame Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Smok tchnie złośliwe zamiary we wszystkie płomienie w stożku 90 stóp. Smok przywołuje elementala ognia w przestrzeni każdej istoty w okolicy, która płonie. Żywiołaki ognia działają z inicjatywą liczoną na 20.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 273 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

reaction.name: Billowing Wings
entries: As a reaction to taking 30 or more damage from a single source, the dragon may shroud itself in smoke, then immediately move up to half its speed. The area in 60 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Inhale
entries: Smok toczy się, by naładować jedną ze swoich broni oddechowych.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and pushed up to 15 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: When a creature without fire resistance starts its turn within 5 feet of the dragon, it catches fire and begins to burn. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje trzy ataki: jeden gryzieniem i dwa pazurami.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17})

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 19} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. Stworzenie może powtórzyć rzut ratujący na koniec każdej swojej tury, kończąc efekt na sobie w przypadku sukcesu. Jeśli rzut ratunkowy się powiedzie lub efekt się skończy, stworzenie jest odporne na Przerażającą Obecność Smoka przez następne 24 godziny.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) fire damage and catching fire on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 128 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its fire breath.

legendary.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: One creature within 90 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

legendary.name: Billowing Wings
entries: The dragon shrouds itself in smoke, then immediately moves up to half its speed. The area in 30 foot radius becomes heavily obscured until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Tail Sweep (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon.

trait.name: Searing Aura
entries: When a creature without fire resistance starts its turn within 5 feet of the dragon, it takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}).

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 14d6}) fire damage and catching fire on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 30 feet of the dragon and within 20 feet of a flame hitting it with an attack or harmful spell, the dragon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage and catching fire on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

reaction.name: Manipulate Flames
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 10 feet of the dragon and within 30 feet of a flame hitting it with an attack or harmful spell, the dragon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or catch fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Forest Walk
entries: Ruch smoka nie jest utrudniony przez naturalne lub magiczne liście.

trait.name: Poison Wounds
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the dragon takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, or 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage if it has less than half its hit points.

trait.name: Camouflage
entries: Smok ma przewagę w sprawdzaniu skradania się, jeśli znajduje się w odległości większej niż 30 stóp od jakiejkolwiek wrogiej istoty.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. The target must then succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or lose any resistance to poison damage for the next minute. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more also loses any immunity to poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition for the next minute.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}) and {@condition restrained}. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 300 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a poisonous cloud in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 98 ({@damage 28d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

action.name: Entangling Vines {@recharge 5}
entries: Barbed vines burst from the ground in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. Until the dragon uses this ability again, the area is difficult terrain. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

reaction.name: Adapt Camouflage
entries: Jako reakcja na trafienie atakiem dystansowym, smok może dopasować swój wygląd do najbliższego otoczenia. Do końca swojej następnej tury smok staje się {@condition invisible} dla istot oddalonych od niego o więcej niż 30 stóp.

reaction.name: Savage
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 30 feet resisting or negating a source of poison damage, the dragon may move up to half its speed and makes a bite attack against the creature.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 277 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Blinding Venom
entries: Jedna istota w promieniu 30 stóp musi zaliczyć {@dc 19} rzut ratunkowy na Konstytucję lub zostać {@condition blinded} do końca następnej tury smoka.

legendary.name: Snatch
entries: Smok wykonuje atak pazurami przeciwko stworzeniu, przed którym jest ukryty. Jeśli atak trafi, cel jest {@condition grappled}, {@condition stunned} i ukryty przed sojusznikami do początku swojej następnej tury. Ten atak nie ujawnia automatycznie pozycji smoka.

legendary.name: Slink Away
entries: Smok porusza się do połowy swojej prędkości lotu. Ataki okazjonalne sprowokowane przez ten ruch są wykonywane z minusem. Jeśli zakończy ten ruch w co najmniej połowie pokrycia, może natychmiast spróbować się ukryć.

entries: Jako reakcja na trafienie atakiem dystansowym, smok może dopasować swój wygląd do najbliższego otoczenia. Do końca swojej następnej tury smok staje się {@condition invisible} dla istot oddalonych od niego o więcej niż 30 stóp.

reaction.name: Savage
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 20 feet resisting a source of poison damage, the dragon may move up to half its speed and makes a bite attack against the creature.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: Jeśli smokowi nie uda się rzut ratunkowy, może zamiast tego wybrać sukces.

trait.name: Building Charge
entries: When the dragon rolls to recharge its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage. If the dragon succesfully recharges its lightning breath, creatures within 10 feet of it take an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the dragon. Each other creature within 10 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw or take half the attack's damage and be pushed 10 feet away.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 300-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 99 ({@damage 18d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon may instead direct its breath at the sky. If it does, five lightning bolts each strike a seperate 5 ft. radius area within 300 feet. A creature in the area of one or more of them must save against the breath weapon.

action.name: Wilting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon inhales, draining the moisture from a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 81 ({@damage 18d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Discharge
entries: As a reaction to passing a saving throw against a spell, the dragon may force the spell's caster to take {@damage 1d10} damage per level of the spell.

reaction.name: Sandstorm
entries: As a reaction to being hit with an attack, the dragon may force the attacker to make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 331 HP, the dragon immediately recharges and uses one of its breath weapons.

legendary.name: Ionic Attunement
entries: Jedna istota w promieniu 60 stóp musi wykonać {@dc 24} rzut ratunkowy na Konstytucję lub stracić odporność na błyskawice, którą posiada, a także odczuć minus przy następnym rzucie ratunkowym na zręczność w ciągu następnej minuty.

legendary.name: Gather Charge
entries: Smok porusza się z prędkością równą swojej szybkości chodu lub nory. Jeśli w trakcie tego ruchu zostanie trafiony atakiem, może natychmiast rzucić się do ładowania jednej ze swoich broni oddechowych. Może tym ruchem poruszać się przez wytwory magicznej siły, niszcząc je.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

action.name: Flesh Melting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more suffers deformities, and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws, and attacks based on Strength or Dexterity.

reaction.name: Bloodied Breath (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 98 hit points, the dragon immediately recharges and uses its breath weapon.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a creature attempts to leave the dragon's reach, the dragon may force it to make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 10 feet back towards the dragon. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the dragon's reaction.

legendary.name: Swipe
entries: The dragon makes a claw attack against a flying creature in range. If the attack hits, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Mire
entries: The dragon disturbs the earth around it. A creature that is not flying and ends its movement within 10 feet of the dragon begins to sink into the earth, and must make a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on dexterity saves, has a -2 penalty to its AC, and can't make more than a single attack in a turn. These effects last until the end of the dragon's next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sensitivity Aura
entries: Attacks against creatures that do not have acid resistance or immunity within 5 feet of the dragon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three  attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It may replace one claw attack with a tail attack.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). On a critical hit, the target has vulnerability to the next source of acid damage it receives in the next minute.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the dragon.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Grasping Muck
entries: As a reaction to being struck with an attack by a creature that is not flying, the dragon may force the attacker to succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the dragon's next turn.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a creature attempts to leave the dragon's reach, the dragon may force it to make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 10 feet back towards the dragon. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the dragon's reaction.

reaction.name: Swipe
entries: As a reaction to a flying creature entering its reach, the dragon makes a claw attack against it. If the attack hits, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sensitivity Aura
entries: Attacks against creatures that do not have acid resistance or immunity within 5 feet of the dragon score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Acid Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. On a critical hit, if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Cruel Jest
entries: As a reaction when a creature attempts to leave the dragon's reach, the dragon may force it to make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be dragged 5 feet back towards the dragon. If the creature fails this save by 5 or more, this ability does not use the dragon's reaction.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The Tyrannosaur's attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when targeting a {@condition stunned} creature.

trait.name: Primal Undeath
entries: When the tyrannosaurus is reduced to zero hit points, it does not die. Instead, it immediately disgorges all remaining zombies and falls {@condition prone}, and a section of its skull shears off, revealing its brain. The tyrannosaurus' brain is a Tiny object with AC 20 and 10 hit points. If its brain is destroyed, the tyrannosaurus dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target. It may replace its bite with a use of its Thunderous Roar.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The tyrannosaurus emits a thunderous roar in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition stunned} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to a creature trying and failing to escape its grapple, the Tyrannosaur may thrash its head about. The {@condition grappled} creature must make a {@dc 17} Constitution Saving Throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is instead {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn.

reaction.name: Disgorge Zombie
entries: As a reaction to taking damage or failing a save against a spell or magical effect, the tyrannosaurus disgorges a normal zombie, which appears in an unoccupied space within 10 ft. and acts on initiative count 0. The tyrannosaur typically contains 10 zombies when encountered.

trait.name: Opportunistic Feeder
entries: The Tyrannosaur's attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when targeting a {@condition stunned} creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target. It may replace its bite with a use of its Thunderous Roar.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The tyrannosaurus emits a thunderous roar in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is also {@condition stunned} until the end of the Tyrannosaur's next turn.

reaction.name: Thrash
entries: As a reaction to a creature trying and failing to escape its grapple, the Tyrannosaur may thrash its head about. The {@condition grappled} creature must make a {@dc 17} Constitution Saving Throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn. A creature that fails this save by 5 or more is instead {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the tyrannosaurus' next turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Grasslands Hunter
entries: The velociraptor can attempt to Hide as a bonus action in dense foliage.

action.name: Ripping Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. On a critical hit, the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it is Medium or smaller.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. This attack scores a critical on a 19 or 20 against a {@condition prone} creature.

trait.name: Booming Crest
entries: The hadrosaur can communicate simple ideas such as "Danger" or "Food" to each creature within 5 miles that understands it, using low-frequency sounds produced in its crest.

trait.name: Bird Hipped
entries: At the beginning of its turn, the Hadrosaur may rear up on two legs until the end of its turn. If it does, it can dash as a bonus acton this turn, and cannot use its multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hadrosaur makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Scute Armor
entries: Creatures cannot benefit from flanking the ankylosaurus unless it is {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankylosaurus makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its tail club. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage. This attack deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage to a {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: Tail Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, the target is pushed 10 feet away, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. A Large or larger creature that fails this save by 5 or more is unable to stand until it completes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Flatten
entries: As a reaction to taking 10 or more damage from a single source, the ankylosaurus presses its body to the ground, protecting its soft underbelly. Until the beginning of its next turn, the Anklyosaurus adds 3 to its AC.

monster.name: Tomb Tapper Hulkdriver
languages: understands Common and Undercommon but can't speak

trait.name: Petrified Death
entries: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Obects it is wearing or carrying are not transformed.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: If the tomb tapper takes any thunder damage, it is {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn. While {@condition deafened}, the tomb tapper is also {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Magic Sense
entries: The tomb tapper knows the precise location of each source of magic within 240 ft. of it.

trait.name: Hulk Driver
entries: While not {@condition incapacitated}, the tomb tapper telepathically controls each umber hulk within 60 ft. At the beginning of each of the tomb tapper's turns, each umber hulk within 60 ft. may use its reaction to move up to its burrow speed.

trait.name: Huge Stature
entries: A creature adjacent to the tomb tapper may spend half of its movement to attempt a {@dc 19} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the creature climbs onto the tomb tapper. While climbing on the tomb tapper, a creature has advantage on melee attacks against the tomb tapper, and the tomb tapper has disadvantage on melee attacks against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks, one of which it may replace with a use of its stoneshock hammer drive.

action.name: Arenite Sledgehammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) force damage and the creature is pushed 5 feet away. Creatures within 5 feet of the target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking half the attack's damage on a failed save. As a bonus action, the tomb tapper can return the hammer to its hand.

action.name: Sweeping Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). A creature that attempts to cast a spell while {@condition grappled} in this way must succeed on a {@dc 19} saving throw using its spellcasting modifier or have its spell fail.

action.name: Swallow Whole
entries: One Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the tomb tapper must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 66 ({@damage 12d10}) piercing damage, or half as much on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is swallowed whole. A creature with proficiency in Perception can see and target the swallowed creature with ranged abilities. As an action, a creature can pry the tomb tapper's mouth open with a successful {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Stoneshock Hammer Drive {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant throws its hammer. Each creature in a 10 foot wide, 120 ft. long line must suceed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 39 ({@damage 6d12}) bludgeoning damage, be knocked {@condition prone}, and be pushed 10 feet away, or take half as much damage on a success. Walls of Wood or Stone up to 10 ft. thick in the area are destroyed.

reaction.name: Hunt Magic
entries: As a reaction to a creature within 15 ft. casting a spell, using a psionic ability, or activating a magic item, the tomb tapper makes a melee attack against it.

reaction.name: Telepathic Shriek (1/Day)
entries: As a reaction to being reduced below 119 hit points, the tomb tapper lets out a telepathic shriek. Each creature within 60 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and lose concentration, if it was holding it. Each umber hulk in the area is freed from the tomb tapper's control until the end of its following turn.
